comments: He is a good professor, despite the fact he only talks in spanish during class. He explains everything very well. Good teacher

Really nice guy, except he barely speaks any english. Everyday its the same routine with how he teaches and he follows the book exactly. Every class he assigns hw, usually only 1 worksheet, but is mandatory that you do it. It\'s funny to try n have a convo with him especially if ur speakin spanglish to him cuz he barely understands.
